div.bibl: Greek Star, Nov. 6, 1908, Correspondence, of Mr. Peter S. Lambros, 130 N. Wells St., Chicago, Illinois. Hot Springs, Va. July 8, 1908.

body.p: I beg to acknowledge the receipt of your letter of July 3rd and to thank you for your kind words of congratulation and for sending me the clipping from your paper, the Greek-Star.
I note what you say concerning the Greek vote in this country and shall take pleasure in turning your letter over to the chairman of the National committee.
